content: warm up baby s world with this cushy crochet blanket for the nursery or playroom stitched in bernat baby blanket this dreamy layer is warm and plush and bound to become their favorite blankie easy to make as you work in rounds you ll practice half_double_crochet single_crochet double_crochet and chain to create a big granny square customize colors for the best baby shower gift materials bernat® baby blanket™ 10 5 oz/300 g 220 yds/201 m main color mc seafoam 04736 2 balls or 440 yds/400 m contrast a lemon lime 04223 1 ball or 220 yds/201 m measurement approx 33 84 cm square
